original_text: They shall come all for violence: their faces shall sup up as the east wind, and they shall gather the captivity as the sand.
korean_text: 그들은 다 강포를 행하러 오는데 앞을 향하여 나아가며 사람을 사로잡아 모으기를 모래 같이 많이 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: They shall come all for violence
their faces shall sup up as the east wind
and they shall gather the captivity
